name: greenchain-converse

scripts.dev:landing: cd frontend/Landing-Hero && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:messbot: cd frontend/MessBot-Hero && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:insti: cd frontend/Insti-Hero && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:processor: cd frontend/Processor-Hero && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:landing" "npm run dev:messbot" "npm run dev:insti" "npm run dev:processor"

description: GreenChain is an IoT-based system that tracks waste disposal using a smart bin. It measures waste weight using sensors, sends the data to a backend server, stores it in a database, and displays it on an admin dashboard.
